attributes.action: National funeral/day of remembrance/celebration for Covid deaths
attributes.additional_details:
I would like a central, non-denominational day of mourning, a service to celebrate and commemorate all those who have died during the Covid 19 Pandemic.
Bringing all religions and non religious people together to honour those who have lost their lives, either directly due to Covid, or for whatever reasons during the pandemic.

I feel the government could fund and televise a poignant day of offering.
